original_title: Strange Beauty: The Art of Shyama Golden
overview: A portrait of artist and illustrator Shyama Golden that showcases her dynamic work and interweaves her personal story. Despite the bold colors and whimsical approach, Golden's portraits stare back at the viewer, holding their gaze with resignation and power. While in her landscapes and paintings Golden creates worlds with elements of magical realism. Strange Beauty offers a glimpse into her approach to finding inspiration and creating art.
title: Strange Beauty: The Art of Shyama Golden
